summary: "TAKATA RECALL" IT IA ABOUT A YEAR FROM THE RECALL. OWNERS WERE CALLED TO AVOID USING PASSENGER SEAT INSTEAD, OTHERWISE ANY PERSON THERE WOULD DEAD . SO I BECAME "UBER" DRIVER?  HOW CAN GUARANTEE THE SAFETY OF MY FAMILY SEATING IN FRONT? THE CAR NOW IS JUST FOR 4 PASSENGERS....FOR A  YEAR...WE NEED A SOLUTION, I CAN NOT EVEN SELL THE CAR LIKE THAT....
